DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine low back treatment would change hip knee muscle activity people without anterior knee pain . The investigator hypothesize low back treatment may change hip knee muscle activity people anterior knee pain people without anterior knee pain .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Lumbopelvic Manipulation Hip Knee Neuromuscular Activity
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria participant patellofemoral pain syndrome group : 1. insidious onset symptom nontraumatic origin 2. pain patellar facet palpation compression 3. subjective knee pain rating least 3/10 pain visual analog scale least one follow activity : ascend stair descend stair kneel squat run jump prolong sit 20 minute Exclusion criterion participant : 1. history spine , hip knee surgery 2. history hip pathology knee condition 3. current significant injury lower extremity joint 4. pregnancy 5. sign nerve root compression 6. osteoporosis history compression fracture Age gender match control participant recruit sign symptom patellofemoral pain syndrome none exclusion criterion
